statements: UPDATE incident_reports SET incident_type='Theft', location='Main Street', description='Stolen items', reported_by='Alice' WHERE incident_id=1;
UPDATE incident_reports SET reported_by='Bob', incident_date='2022-01-15 08:30:00', location='Park', incident_type='Vandalism' WHERE incident_id=2;
UPDATE incident_reports SET location='Office Building', description='Fire alarm triggered' WHERE incident_id=101;
UPDATE incident_reports SET incident_date='2022-08-30 10:30:00', reported_by='John Doe' WHERE incident_type='Fire' AND location='Warehouse';
UPDATE incident_reports SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE incident_id = 1;
UPDATE security_events SET event_description = 'Security breach detected' WHERE event_id = 10;
UPDATE incident_reports SET location = 'New Location', description = 'Updated Description' WHERE incident_id = 1;
UPDATE security_events SET event_type = 'New Event Type', event_description = 'Event Description Updated' WHERE incident_id = 2;
UPDATE incident_reports SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE report_id = 1;
UPDATE security_measures SET measure_description = 'New description', measure_category = 'Updated Category' WHERE measure_id = 2;
UPDATE incident_reports SET description = 'New Description', incident_type = 'Theft' WHERE report_id = 2;
UPDATE security_measures SET measure_description = 'Enhanced security measures implemented.', measure_name = 'CCTV Cameras' WHERE measure_id = 1;
UPDATE IncidentReports SET incident_description = 'Vandalism incident', security_level = 3 WHERE incident_id = 101;
UPDATE SecurityCameras SET resolution = '4K', installation_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE camera_id = 201;
UPDATE IncidentReports SET incident_description = 'Updated description', security_level = 2 WHERE incident_id = 1;
UPDATE SecurityCameras SET resolution = '1080p', camera_model = 'Advanced Model' WHERE location_id = 2;
UPDATE incident_reports SET description = 'Vandalism reported in the park' WHERE incident_id = 101
UPDATE security_officers SET department = 'Security' , name = 'John Doe' WHERE officer_id = 201
UPDATE incident_reports SET location='Parking Lot', description='Vandalism reported by a witness' WHERE incident_id=1001;
UPDATE suspects SET age=32, gender='Male', description='Tall with tattoos on both arms' WHERE suspect_id=2001;
